jobs.description: Job scope Testing Strategy, Design and Planning Phase    Involve in understanding the requirements from multiple internal      and external stakeholders’ groups and work with the development team      throughout development to define and improve the build system quality.   Review stories or requirement specs to ensure that requirements      stated are correct, unambiguous and verifiable. i.e. verify that      definition of done is able to meet of every released feature.   Discuss, analyze and recommend design improvements or corrections      to developers throughout the development process.   Collaborate closely with stakeholders and project team to identify      needs and requirements for estimation of testing scope and time frame.   Develop and establish quality assurance deliverables and testing      framework, including create and maintain test plans and test cases in      accordance with changing requirements, throughout development.   Create and manage automated test framework whenever possible such      as prepare test environment, create automated functional testing scripts,      maintain functional testing script in accordance with changing      requirements.  Testing Execution/Implementation Phase    Conduct system integration tests with external parties, validate      the output and expected outcome e.g. data to and from external parties’      systems and feedback on improvement requirement.   Conduct extensive manual functional /exploratory testing, including      browser testing.   Conduct performance and load tests, validate the output and      expected outcomes and feedback on improvement required.   Conduct application performance and security testing to ensure we      have a robust and secured system in place.   Conduct impact analysis of defect fixes discovered during manual or      automated tests, validate completed stories pass the acceptance criteria,      raising defects as needed and work with development team to improve the      expected behavior and test cases.   Demonstrate the tested stories during Sprint Review and prepare      production show case to show the completed stories tested.  Job requirement    Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent   With at least 2 years of relevant experience in software testing.   Certified Software Testing Professional and/or Certified Software      Quality Analyst or an equivalent certification will be a plus, e.g. ISTQB.   Good understanding and completion of projects using waterfall/Agile      methodology.   Demonstrate knowledge of automated software testing methodologies      such as integration testing, functional testing.   Familiarity with automated testing software such as JMeter and      Selenium.   Having .NET experience will be a plus   Team player with ability to collaborate and work effectively within      team.   Good written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills.   Passion for automation, standardization and best practices.  Thank you for your interest! We respect your privacy and all communication will be treated with confidentiality. If you wish to know more about this position or explore other roles, please prepare your updated profile and get in touch with our consultant at  cristina.malijan@manpower.com.sg Cristina Malabuyoc Malijan EA License No. 02C3423 Personnel Registration No. R1111547  Please note that your response to this advertisement and communications with us pursuant to this advertisement will constitute informed consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of personal data by ManpowerGroup Singapore for the purpose of carrying out its business, in compliance with the relevant provisions of the Personal Data Protection Act 2012. To learn more about ManpowerGroup's Global Privacy Policy, please visit https://www.manpower.com.sg/privacy-policy

company.name: TESCOM (SINGAPORE) SOFTWARE SYSTEMS TESTING PTE LTD.

jobs.description: Tescom is an IT consulting firm providing a range of professional services in functional testing, automation testing, cyber security testing, performance testing, independent IT auditing, usability testing, resource augmentation, IT support and training. We are looking to hire Automation Test Engineers, to join us in an exciting engagement. This is a rewarding role that requires candidates to exercise their technical skills with automation test tools and frameworks.  Responsibilities    Collaborate closely with stakeholders and project team to identify,      analyse and review design needs and requirements for estimation of      automation testing scope and schedule   Develop and maintain automation testing deliverables, such as      automation test scripts, automation test frameworks and work with      automation test tools.   Conduct automation test execution according to the company’s      current automation test strategy.   Develop and execute automation test scripts against backend batch      jobs and backup jobs.   Conduct defect management.   Collect and report on testing progress.   Adopt, execute and champion the company’s software testing and      quality assurance processes.   Participate actively in various Agile ceremonies such as sprint      planning, stand-up meetings, and sprint retrospectives.  Qualifications    Tertiary Qualification in Information Security, Information      Technology, Computer Science, Engineering (Computing/Telecommunication) or      equivalent   Minimum of 3 years of relevant working experience in automation      testing   Experience using Test management tools: Jira.   Experience using Automation Testing tools such as Postman, Robot      Framework, and Karate Framework.   Experience with automation testing involving backend batch jobs and      backup jobs.   Certified Software Testing Professional and/or Certified Software      Quality Analyst or an equivalent certification will be an added advantage   Good understanding of Agile methodology is preferred   Strong client and project management abilities coupled with      excellent communication, written, analytical, organizational and problem-solving skills  Think you have what it takes? Email us your resume now : sherin.kaur@tescom-apac.com  An exciting new career awaits you!

Job Purpose: Test program development and implementation for new products.  Key Responsibilities:    ATE test program development and implementation for new products (Production and Characterization Test)   Test Hardware (final test loadboard and wafersort probecard) design and development for engineering activities and production ramp-up   Perform characterization testing, prepare test specifications, define tests, conditions, criteria, etc.   Solid digital and mixed-signal programming experience on ATE using C++/VB language and scripting   Automate test process by writing software scripts to improve work efficiency.   Monitor and manage production test yields, maverick lots, engineering lots   Hands-on test debugging, RMA analysis and improving test solutions (Hardware and Software)   Work with product designer and DFT engineer to ensure smooth product bring-up   Responsible for overseeing product reliability stresses and test results   Establish cost-effective production test solutions.  Additional Responsibilities: a) Any reasonable task assigned by management and deemed to be within the individuals’ capabilities to ensure smooth running of the business. b) As this is an evolving business, ongoing change is an integral part of the position. Management will liaise with the individual on any fundamental change to work practices. The individual is required to embrace and adopt any change to working practices.  Knowledge and skill requirements:    Bachelor's degree in engineering (electrical/electronics)   Minimum 5 years of relevant working experience in semiconductor industry   Knowledge and hands on experience with industry standard Automated Test Equipment – Teradyne J750.   Experience on Advantest T2K, Advantest 93K, UltraFlex, Chroma is a plus.   Strong understanding of ATE Test Programming principles, preferablywith experience in Digital and Mixed signal testing   Test Software development experience ; skills, including knowledge of C/C++, VB, PERL, Python etc.   Experience/knowledge in new product characterization and qualification.   Experience in test Hardware development (loadboard and probecard)   Good knowledge on manufacturing process (fab, packaging,test)   Good aptitude in statistical data analysis, problem solving and solution finding.  Working Conditions: - Working conditions are normal for an office environment. - Work requires willingness to work a flexible schedule.

COMPANY DESCRIPTION      Beyondsoft International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd. was set up in 2007 and established as the regional headquarters for the Southeast Asia (SEA) and European markets in September 2015. Based on our vision of "Using technology to promote social progress, economic development and become a global customer preferred partner" and our concept of "Beyond your expectations", Beyondsoft is committed to provide our customers in countries along the "Belt and Road" with comprehensive solutions and products and creating commercial value for customers to realizing continuous businesses development. Our core business includes: IT development servicesProviding customers with IT consulting, software research and development, software and hardware testing, system integration and operation and maintenance, data analysis and other services; New retail solutions and productsThrough intelligent products, helping small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) realize the digital transformation of their daily operations; Internet of Things (IoT) platform and solutionsComprehensive use of IoT, artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing and other technologies to provide IoT solutions for intelligent upgrades in cities, parks, buildings and industries, to create a smart future. For more information, please visit www.beyondsoft.com.      RESPONSIBILITIES      Window cloning Review and clarify test requirement Execute testing based on the test cases Perform the exploratory test and clarify test procedure when needed Perform troubleshooting and identify root causes for the issues and report the defects Record and document results Design and develop test cases based on the test requirements and specifications Manage a team of system tester  QUALIFICATIONS     Minimum Diploma in Computer Science or relevant studies Minimum 1 year of software or prototype testing Experience with automation tools (i.e. run automation scripts, analyze reports and issues, report bugs) will be a distinct advantage Open to candidates who possess passion and interest in gaming industry        OTHER INFORMATION     We are looking for a technical candidate who is passionate about resolving complex customer issues in a quality and timely manner. This will be a new position to drive new testing procedures for new products. We are open to candidates who are keen with prototype and software testing as well. Training opportunities for career training and growth will be provided.      Please note that your application will be sent to and reviewed by the direct employer - Beyondsoft International (Singapore) Pte Ltd

jobs.jobTitle: Software Testing & Business Analyst - Graduate Programme
jobs.description: The demand for software testing is continuing to grow! Driven by continual technological advancements, FDM is seeking the next generation of specialists to join our Software Testing graduate programme to safeguard the future of technology and support the progression of the industry. About this role On the FDM Software Testing Graduate Programme, you will undergo industry recognised training before putting that into practice by working on projects with one of our industry leading clients. This programme will provide you with multiple future career opportunities ranging from Test Analyst and Quality Engineer through to Test Lead, Test Manager and Automated Test Engineer. Testing is an essential component of IT project delivery as all businesses implement these processes to support the management of risk and the delivery of high-quality products. Software Testing teams work hard to validate new technologies to ensure they are implemented successfully across their business both from a customer and internal process improvement perspective. With the huge surge in demand for testers, this is a role for those who are personable and have excellent stakeholder management skills as well as a passion for coding and working with new technology. Through our programme you will be provided with tailored training to help you develop a variety of skills that are required to be successful within both manual and automated testing roles. Through which you will be equipped with knowledge and skills that include ISTQB Foundation Level Qualification; test script creation and execution, defect management, test automation using a variety of coding languages, software tools and frameworks, providing you with a strong foundation upon which you can build a diverse and successful career. Benefits    A full-time contract with a salary from Day 1 of training   Training is provided by industry experts, covering both technical and professional skills to ensure you are job-ready   Ongoing career support throughout your entire FDM journey, including professional development, mentoring, and social networking events with a community of peers   A chance to launch a career in one of the most in-demand tech fields  Minimum Qualifications    Educated to a university degree level (bachelor or higher), no STEM degree required   Demonstrable interest and desire to work in technology   Ability to commit to completing our full 2.5-year graduate programme   Eligible to work in Singapore  About FDM Our people are our passion and that's why we make your training and career growth our priority. We are a global professional services provider focusing on IT and one of the Singapore's leading graduate employers, recruiting the brightest talent to become the innovators of tomorrow. With centres across Europe, North America and Asia-Pacific, and nearly 5000 consultants currently placed on client site around the world, FDM has shown exponential growth throughout the years, firmly establishing itself as an award-winning FTSE 250 employer. Diversity and Inclusion FDM Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or any other status protected by federal, provincial or local laws.

They are actively looking for Hardware Test Engineer to join their team.  Job Summary:    Understand test standards and relate test requirements/specifications in order to perform hardware tests on products.   Design the test fixture accordingly, setup, perform test, evaluate and troubleshoot failures and record in standard test reports.   Responsibilities    Design test setup for testing in varies test (environment and EMC test)   Support and perform hardware tests according to IEC61000-4-4, IEC61010, IEC 60721-3-3, IEC60068-2-6 and robustness standards etc.   Set up test for environment test, EMC test, etc.   Coordinate with HW designers to analysis test result and investigate failure if any.   Document test results according to company standards.   Requirements:    Bachelor’s degree in Engineering.   Min 3 year experience in relevant roles.   Knowledge on environment test, EMC tests (ESD, Surge, CE, RE, etc)   Application of relevant EMC and safety, an understanding of outside body approval requirements LVD, UL, CSA, marine etc.   Knowledge on PLC programming is a plus   Knowledge on schematic and layout is a plus.   If you possess above relevant skillsets, please send in your updated CV in word format to Apple.lim@manpower.com.sg  Lim Pey Chyi Recruitment Consultant (R2090579) Manpower Staffing Services (S) Pte Ltd EA Licence: 02C3423

They are actively looking for Assistant Validation ; Test Engineer to join their team.  Responsibilities: Product and System Validation    Understand test requirements from test plan.   Ensure the availability of all test means (equipment ; tools, test standards facilities) to achieve product’s conformance.   Ensure correct usage of equipment ; tools by reading the user manual, or train by engineers.   Manage and perform product’s validation in accordance with test plan to ensure that the products meet the requirements.   Perform some simple problem solving (identify, diagnose, and troubleshoot technical problems).   Ensure on-time completion on all assigned product and system validation according to test schedule.   Continual improvement of Laboratory process    Continue to improve the work processes in laboratory to ensure the efficiency and effectiveness of the testing/processes   To optimize the planning and management of the test schedule as to maximize the usage of the test equipment   Always keep good cleanliness and tidiness of the laboratory to ensure safety of the workplace (NOTE: Laboratory does not responsible for any safety related issues caused by negligence or abuse of the person working in laboratory)   Contribute for improvement of laboratory tidiness and safety by helping implement of new measures (proposed by the department)   Test Reporting    Create test reports for performed tests and present test synopsis to project and requester   To write clear and concise reports which address the technical needs of requestors   Requirements:    Diploma in Electrical/ Electronics/ Mechatronics Engineering   Minimum 1 year experience in product verification and validation testing of industrial electromechanical and electronics products.   Good understanding of international standards   Experience working with Project Management / Product Evolution Processes   ISO/IEC 17025 knowledge or experience will be ideal   Exposure to industrial electromechanical and electronics products testing   Knowledge of FMEA, FTA, 6 Sigma concepts ; problem-solving methodologies will be ideal   Familiar with international test standards e.g. IEC, UL, CSA, Marine, etc.   If you possess above relevant skillsets, please send in your updated CV in word format to Apple.lim@manpower.com.sg  Lim Pey Chyi Recruitment Consultant (R2090579) Manpower Staffing Services (S) Pte Ltd EA Licence: 02C3423

Covering a range of power supply design verification testing, failure analysis of the product and alternative components evaluation during start of product development till EOL of the product.   Understand and follow design verification test procedure and setup accurately.   Perform full design verification tests or experiments as needed to support or confirm the design with proper written report for new product design, legacy product and competitor model, including functional tests and reliability tests, like thermal test, EMI/EMC test.   Work closely with design engineer on projects and expected to provide a summary of Design Validation Test (DVT) report and issues encountered.   Perform tests and experiments by following the test matrix to select and qualify the alternative component.   Good soldering skill for board modification and prototype preparation, including magnetic components building following formal and marked-up drawing.   Understand and analyse power supply circuit, safety requirement and mechanical construction will be an added advantage.   Troubleshoot power supplies to identify root cause and provide feedback to Quality, Manufacturing ; Design teams to discuss the solution to drive the design improvement or design changes.   Perform tests and experiments as needed to support or confirm customer issues.   Prepare and present the customer failure analysis reports.   Supporting on equipment annual calibration and general house keeping.   May be required to support team / supervisor on other tasks.  Requirements    Minimum bachelor’s degree in Electrical/Electronic engineering.   Preferably more than 2 years’ experience in power electronics design and evaluation.   Familiar with Microsoft 365 - Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Teams, SharePoint. Experience in Power Platform is a strong plus.   Results-driven, detail-oriented, and passionate for continuous improvement.   Good technical writing capabilities, excellent communication, problem solving and analytical skills.  Kindly understand that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. EnviroDynamics Solutions Pte Ltd Poon Wai Soon, Bernard Reg. No: R2197713 EA License No.: 12C6285
